stories.text:
I have been perusing the mozilla docs for months now and still feel a bit lost.

Mozilla is a great reference but not the best for tutorials imho.

Is https://learnjavascript.online/ my best bet?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Resources to Learn JavaScript?

stories.text:
It has been very convenient to merge every device in a phone over the last decade yet I think I want separate functionalities be... separate devices. What are my options for camera without a phone?

It has to be:

1. like a camera in a phone - to be always with me; except phone part that I want to leave and disconnect

2. able to easily transfer images from it to my laptop, preferably without wires. No accounts should be involved in the process.

3. updated every ones in a while, e.g. software, firmware..

It does not have to:

1. better than camera in a phone

2. best

Go Pro? Some android without SIM card with data/wi-fi that does not have Google/Samsung/you-name-it account?
stories.title: Camera without a phone?
